function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate natural ventilation in academic buildings A, B, C, and Workshop Building D increases the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of spreading contagious diseases among students and faculty.","Mitigation":"Install enhanced HVAC systems with proper filtration and ventilation or use air purifiers to reduce the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Enhanced HVAC systems, air purifiers.","People":"Students, faculty, visitors.","Owner":"Building management, facilities department."},{"Description":"Insufficient natural light in most rooms on the campus can impact the well-being of occupants and potentially compromise their immune systems, making them more susceptible to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Reduced overall health and immunity, increasing the risk of illness and disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Utilize daylighting systems, increase window sizes, and use artificial lighting solutions to improve illumination levels.","Technologies":"Daylighting systems, artificial lighting.","People":"Occupants, students, faculty.","Owner":"Facilities department, building management."},{"Description":"Inadequate interior finishing materials and lack of special installations in the car parking building may lead to poor hygiene conditions, increasing the risk of surface contamination and disease spread.","Impact":"Higher potential for surface-based disease transmission and compromised hygiene.","Mitigation":"Upgrade interior finishing materials to easily cleanable surfaces, install hygiene and sanitation stations, and implement regular cleaning and maintenance schedules.","Technologies":"Easy-to-clean finishing materials, hygiene stations.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, drivers.","Owner":"Building maintenance, facilities department."}]}
